subject: docs: merge development standards template into CLAUDE.md
body:
Add HARD RULES section with coding standards (best practices, code
organization thresholds, decision documentation format, UX guidelines,
frontend rules, cleanup, quality checks), project-specific configuration,
communication style, testing, and prohibitions sections. Cross-reference
expanded rules from existing principles. Trim AI Notes to avoid duplication.

https://claude.ai/code/session_018ZdgT44HTsrdbgEBQ4hdxc
title: merge development standards template into CLAUDE.md
